SEARCH
Package grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler

Class AbstractGTNetMessageHandler

java.lang.Object
grafioschtrader.gtnet.handler.AbstractGTNetMessageHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
GTNetMessageHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractAnnouncementHandler, AbstractRequestHandler, AbstractResponseHandler, FirstHandshakeRequestHandler, PingMessageHandler
public abstract class AbstractGTNetMessageHandler extends Object implements GTNetMessageHandler
Abstract base class providing common functionality for GTNet message handlers. Provides utility methods for:
  • Storing incoming messages
  • Building response envelopes
  • Converting between POJOs and parameter maps
Subclasses should typically extend the more specialized AbstractRequestHandler or AbstractAnnouncementHandler instead of this class directly.
